title: Remove unused dependencies
description: Clean up go.mod by removing ishell and other unused dependencies. Run go mod tidy after removing shell code.

title: Simplify rmapi to focus on core export-to-PDF functionality
Validate OCR searchable text functionality
description: Test that OCR text layer is properly embedded as invisible text in PDFs. Verify text is searchable and highlightable in PDF viewers.

title: Update README with simplified usage
description: Rewrite README to reflect simplified CLI. Focus on: install, authenticate, export with PDF conversion. Remove references to removed commands.

title: Simplify API layer to read-only operations
description: Remove write-related API methods from api.ApiCtx. Keep only: authentication, document listing/fetching, tree building.

title: Add integration tests for full export pipeline
description: Test end-to-end: mock API -> download .rmdoc -> convert to PDF -> verify OCR text. Test all v3/v5/v6 versions.

title: Consolidate conversion pipeline to single path
description: Simplify conversion to: detect version -> parse (v3/v5/v6) -> render to PNG -> create PDF -> add OCR text layer. Remove fallback complexity.

title: Remove interactive shell and convert to CLI-only tool
description: Remove ishell dependency and interactive mode. Convert to pure CLI with commands passed as arguments. Keep non-interactive mode as primary interface.
close_reason: Converted from ishell interactive shell to simple CLI dispatcher. Created new CLI infrastructure with Command struct and Context. Core commands (mgeta, version, account) fully working. Stubs created for commands to be removed in later tasks. Main.go now uses RunCLI.

title: Remove non-PDF export formats (SVG, vector PDF)
description: Remove svg.go, pdf.go (vector rendering), and SVG fallback. Keep only image-based PDF rendering with OCR.
close_reason: Removed SVG export (svg.go), vector PDF rendering (pdf.go), and fallback logic (fallback.go). Simplified conversion pipeline to use only image-based PDF rendering. Moved parseColor utility to types.go.

title: Remove navigation commands (cd, ls, pwd, find, stat)
description: Remove file tree navigation commands. Export command will take paths directly, no need for cd/pwd context.

title: Remove upload/write operations (put, mput, mkdir, rm, mv)
description: Remove all commands that modify cloud state: put, mput, mkdir, rm, mv, nuke. Keep rmapi as read-only export tool.
close_reason: Removed all write/upload operations (put, mput, mkdir, rm, mv, nuke). Deleted command files, removed stubs, and unregistered commands. rmapi is now read-only.

title: Verify v5 and v6 format support with test files
description: Ensure v3, v5, and v6 .rm file parsing works correctly. Test with real files from each version. Document version detection logic.

title: Create example/demo script showing simplified workflow
description: Create example showing: authenticate -> export directory -> get searchable PDFs. Should demonstrate the core value prop.

title: Simplify CLI to essential commands only
description: Keep only: export (mgeta), version, reset. Remove: account, refresh, get, geta, mget. Main command is recursive export with PDF conversion.
